version_description: We've fixed some bugs to make your ITV Hub experience even better than before!
We've fixed some bugs to make your ITV Hub experience even better than before!
We've made some tweaks to the app design to make it easier for you to navigate. We've also created a Categories area so you can quickly find your favourite type of telly in one place.
We've made some tweaks to the app design to make it easier for you to navigate. We've also created a Categories area so you can quickly find your favourite type of telly in one place.

You can now subscribe to watch ad-free straight from the player. We've also improved Parental Controls, making it easier to manage.
As always, let us know what you think on Twitter @itvhub.

Looking for your next binge watch? You can now find complete Boxsets of selected shows on the Hub. We’ve also added a personalised list of recommended shows and a curated list of our most popular shows to your home page - so you’ll never be at a loss with what to watch!
